title: Web Development
description: I build responsive and interactive websites using modern technologies. Projects include personal websites, e-commerce clones, and web apps.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Designing intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces. I focus on user experience, prototyping, and design systems for web and mobile apps.

title: Data Analysis
description: Analyzing complex datasets to extract actionable insights. Experienced in data visualization, statistical analysis, and reporting.

title: Machine Learning
description: Building predictive models using machine learning algorithms. Includes projects in classification, regression, and clustering.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Creating mobile applications for Android and iOS. Focused on performance, user experience, and cross-platform solutions.
